name: procedural poetry by bella.
description:
explore randomly generated world of poetry.

  procedural poetry aims to generate random 2 line poems. the main goals for the project 

        were to display random, nonsensical and sometimes profound poems to the player. 

  in the name of my poetry generator, some of it is just bullshit and i think that's beautiful.

  there is minimal player input in the game, it mainly just refreshes itself. there is however the option to personalize the experience by pressing 'sign poem.'

 'sign poem' gives players the option to input their name, and it will procedurally generate a signature at the end to close off the poem.

there is also a pause button for those who might want to read the text more slowly, or take a screenshot.

third party assets are found in the readme.txt
